nodes.bodyText: Need to add name parameter here.
I think we can simply do a name == null check here. Instead of instanceof

We need to lift children of children in a sequence
Refer the comment in langlib signature # This is equivalent to children(x).elements(nm).

Shall we move these test cases into Ballerina, as we are targetting to move away from testing in java classes.
You can use string comparisons and also comparisons with xml literals.

Shall we use the same param names as in .bal file
And also type of parameter name is not String it's a union of string and nil
Shall we add a few test cases with namespaces? You can refer XMLAccessTest in jballerina-unit-test module.
